DOC.brief_summary: It single-blind randomize controlled clinical trial evaluate effectiveness neurocognitive therapeutic exercise subject affect shoulder impingement syndrome comparison traditional therapeutic exercise . The traditional exercise protocol contain mainly strengthen exercise , stretch exercise , Codman 's pendulum exercise exercise elastic band resistance . The neurocognitive exercise protocol contain ten exercise involve specific instrument ( e.g. , table incline board five concentric circle , sponge various texture ) . Each subject , randomly assign either neurocognitive therapeutic exercise ( group 1 ) traditional therapeutic exercise ( group 2 ) , submit one-hour session three time week five week . The outcome measure use Quick-DASH questionnaire , Constant-Murley shoulder outcome score , ASES score , visual analogic scale ( VAS ) assessment perform baseline ( T0 ) , end treatment protocol ( T1 ) , 3 month ( T2 ) 6 month ( T3 ) end treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Neurocognitive Therapeutic Exercise Shoulder Impingement Syndrome Comparison With Traditional Therapeutic Exercise
DOC.criteria: Subjects shoulder impingement syndrome establish clinical examination , Xray anteroposterior , axillary outlet view , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) echography . Rotator cuff and/or subscapularis tendon partial/fullthickness tear , capsulolabral pathology responsive surgical repair , congenital abnormality acromion , previous surgery affect shoulder , inflammatory neurological ( systemic local ) diseases involve shoulder girdle , cognitive psychiatric disorder , local tumor metastasis application radiotherapy , acute infection osseous tuberculosis .
